name: [Pre-alpha] The Betrayer: A god's wish
description:
Hello there, I'm a new Belgian indie game developer. I'm not new to programming, but I am still new to game developing in particular. I speak English, Dutch, French, Japanese and understand Spanish. I have programming experience in C, C++, C#, Java and Eiffel. My favourite kind of games are story driven RPG's (any kind), and well written visual novels, in other words: games with a fantastic story. But this doesn't mean that I can't enjoy games of other genres or without a good story.

This current project is being developed with Monogame in C#. Actual development started half October 2015.

Business inquiries can be sent to: support@cronixgames.com

-the development blog: Development Blog
-the twitter page: @CronixGames2015
